message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me halfway?
I can see you're serious about the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit.
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you consider $95? I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. How about we say $105?
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit short. Can you consider $102? I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, but I'm willing to make one more offer. I'll meet you at $110, but that's as low as I can go.
